tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Our experience with Dr. Roopa Varnekar during the delivery of our second baby was truly exceptional. This marked our second time seeking her expertise in Obstetrics and Gynecology, a decision reaffirmed by her remarkable qualities. Dr. Varnekar's extensive experience in the field reassured us that we were under capable hands once again.

Throughout the delivery process, Dr. Varnekar's professionalism and caring nature shone brightly. Her expertise and calm demeanor instilled confidence during what can be an anxious time. She was attentive to every detail, ensuring both the well-being of our baby and my wife's comfort.

What truly distinguishes Dr. Varnekar is her genuine concern. She took the time to address our questions and concerns, creating an environment of trust and open communication. Her support extended beyond the medical aspect, encompassing emotional and psychological well-being.

Our heartfelt gratitude goes to Dr. Varnekar for her instrumental role in the safe and joyful delivery of our second baby. Her skill, empathy, and personalized care make her a truly exceptional healthcare provider in the realm of Obstetrics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Roopa Mam is a class apart, very humble and polite. She asked about the problem in detail and shared her insights about the problem and the treatment with my husband even. I dont see people who are polite enough to speak at length with the Patients and listen to them with so much ease and patience. Im religiously following medication instructed by Dr. Roopa and recovering well. I will definitely go for a second round of happy conversation with her whenever having time , just to say Thank You.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from Adenomyosis from a long time, Dr examined my complete report from the beginning and explained the changes in report. Explained what exactly is happening in the body also how it may affect in future. Though earlier also i was suggested about hysterectomy which i did not accept it but she convinced me that it is the right solution at my age.
Dr called the pathologist and got the blood sample collected and sent for test. Dr is very friendly and explains the complete details which is quiet convincing.
Thanks

Doctor Roopa Mam is very humble and friendlyüëç. She listens carefully and her suggestions works effectively. I had visited her (pre pregnancy period and post pregnancy ) whole pregnancy check up. She doesn't give unnecessary medicines. I had healthy delivery without any complications.Iam very thankful to her. ü§ù

I had a great journey,she was available all the time. When appointment is fixed she ensures she will meet else will personally inform on delay. At times she has called me up to check on my health. she takes good care, advices timely and very friendly. i strongly recommend. 
I have recommended her in past and all are happy with her. best Dr. assured.
Doctor is very friendly and give good suggestions. I am satisfied with her advise and will follow up.

Doctor was good, smiling patiently understanding the problems I had been for an abortion, she gave a nice treatment but after the abortion I am facing vaginal irritation and other issues not sure if it due to the medication or other reasons. On visiting her again she gave me medication for it but it didn't work.
I'm really happy with the consultation. Very friendly and interactive and easy to approach. Thank you ma'am for treating me
Friendly behaviour that makes me very comfortable at the visit, medicine for vaginal infection worked very fast.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had an amazing experience meeting this doctor.she had friendly approach to satisfy me with treatment.She understood my problem well and explained me how to proceed further 
Definitely will recommend this doctor for gynac issues

review: Dr Roopa is highly competent and friendly. She explains the situation and one really gains confidence under her. She spends time with you till you are satisfied and all your questions are answered. A wonderful experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Roopa just for normal check-up and I happendd to know that I was pregnant. From that day till the day I went for my hometown for delivery, she's guided all through way. I had truly nice and memorable experience with Dr. Roopa.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A true professional. Understands and guides well to solve the health issue as well as suggests diet changes. A friendly person

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She gives time to the patient to explain their problem and asks questions to understand the issue clearly.********* ******* *** ********* *********** Supports the patient to opt for healthy diet and exercise if that will help in recovery process. 
Kudos to her!!!
She was really nice to me and explained everything clearly..i felt like talking to some known person
She suggests accurately. She told me and confirmed my thing and exactly suggested when to take other tests.
Dr Roopa was very Good as she answered all the questions patiently and was very friendly . She is very professional,cheering and informative.Thank you mam will visit again.

Good doctor and handles the patient with a smile .
For my periods problem,I went to this doctor and she gave few medicines after that it got regularised.

review: She is friendly and empathetic. Provided good explanations which helped us understand the issue at hand nicely.
